figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Logic model on impact of or association with hate online.

claims.sentence: To better understand how the exposure interacts with individuals through the media and thus better understand how the possible effects of this exposure can take place, we have developed a logic model that can capture the functioning of hate rhetoric and its consequences (see Figure 1).
The result of this process can be seen in Figure 2.

To better understand how the exposure interacts with individuals through the media and thus better understand how the possible effects of this exposure can take place, we have developed a logic model that can capture the functioning of hate rhetoric and its consequences (see Figure 1).
The result of this process can be seen in Figure 2.
